main.Find_quick_answers: Find quick answers to the most common questions about using our app and services.
main.order_food: Order food, book a ride, get your car washed, and enjoy homemade meals all in one place, right from your phone.
main.WhyChooseOurAppDescription: Experience seamless service with these amazing features designed just for you.
main.tips_updates_and_insights: Tips, updates, and insights to help you make the most of our app and services.

services.service1description: Enjoy fresh, homemade dishes prepared by local chefs and delivered to your doorstep.
services.service2description: Order delicious meals from your favorite local restaurants with just a few taps.
services.service3description: Book a reliable ride anytime, anywhere — fast, safe, and affordable transportation.
services.service4description: Get your car cleaned at home or office with our on-demand car wash professionals.

service1.title: Home-Cooked Meals
service1.subtitle: Fresh homemade food
service1.description: Enjoy fresh, homemade dishes prepared by local chefs and delivered to your doorstep.
howItWorks: Users browse home chef menus featuring traditional and homemade dishes
Orders are placed directly from the app with scheduled delivery times
Meals are made fresh with a personal touch
service1.whyUseful: Perfect for users craving traditional food, healthier options, or supporting local cooks.

service2.title: Restaurant Food Delivery
service2.subtitle: Your favorite restaurants
service2.description: Order delicious meals from your favorite local restaurants with just a few taps.
howItWorks: Place your order with special instructions
service2.whyUseful: Get restaurant-quality meals delivered fast to your home or office.

service3.title: Taxi & Ride Booking
service3.subtitle: Safe and reliable
service3.description: Book a reliable ride anytime, anywhere — fast, safe, and affordable transportation.
howItWorks: Enter your pickup and drop-off locations
service3.whyUseful: Perfect for quick trips around town or scheduled appointments.

service4.title: Car Wash Service
service4.subtitle: Professional cleaning
service4.description: Get your car cleaned at home or office with our on-demand car wash professionals.
howItWorks: Schedule a wash at your preferred time
Our team arrives with all necessary equipment
Your car is cleaned while you work or relax
service4.whyUseful: Maintain your car's appearance without wasting your time.

feature1.title: Smart Search & Filtering
feature1.description: Quickly find what you need with intelligent search, advanced filters, and category-based navigation.

feature2.title: Ratings, Reviews & Feedback
feature2.description: Share your experience and read real feedback from other users before choosing a service.

feature3.title: Smooth Booking & Ordering
feature3.description: A seamless process for placing orders or booking services — with real-time status updates.

feature4.title: In-App Chat & Support
feature4.description: Communicate directly with service providers or our support team without leaving the app.

feature5.title: Smart Search & Filtering
feature5.description: Quickly find what you need with intelligent search, advanced filters, and category-based navigation.

feature6.title: Secure Authentication
feature6.description: Sign up and log in safely with multi-layered security and verification steps.
